summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.22.062, 23.24.045, 23.34.011, 23.42.050, 23.44.008, 23.44.012, 23.44.014, 23.44.040, 23.44.041, 23.84A.004, 23.84A.008, 23.84A.032, 23.90.018 and 23.90.019 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to allow detached accessory dwelling units (ADUs) in single family zones in southeast Seattle, making other changes relating to accessory dwelling units and making minor corrections.
